original_text: He ruled the land from Hermon mountain and Salecah in the north, and all of the Bashan region in the east. His land went as far as the borders of the kingdoms of Geshur and Maakah. He ruled half of the Gilead region, as far as the border of King Sihon of Heshbon.
korean_text: 그가 다스리던 땅은 헤르몬 산과 살르가와 온 바산과 및 그술 사람과 마아가 사람의 경계까지의 길르앗 절반이니 헤스본 왕 시혼의 경계에 접한 곳이라

sentences.original_text: He ruled the land from Hermon mountain and Salecah in the north
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 북쪽의 헤르몬 산과 살레카에서 땅을 다스렸습니다

sentences.original_text: and all of the Bashan region in the east
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 동쪽의 바산 지역 전부를 다스렸습니다

sentences.original_text: His land went as far as the borders of the kingdoms of Geshur and Maakah
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 땅은 그수르와 마아카 왕국의 경계까지 뻗어 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: He ruled half of the Gilead region
as far as the border of King Sihon of Heshbon
